python3 -m venv .venv
source .venv/bin/activate

cd to
/Users/mark.raphael/Documents/workspaces/java_workspace/skills-getting-started-with-github-copilot/src

then run from the terminal 
python3 -m uvicorn app:app --reload

if you want to debug from the terminal
python3 -m pdb -m uvicorn app:app
then type continue
